text: Andrei Lvovich Murygin (; born 5 February 1962) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Sibir Novosibirsk players Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Dynamo Vologda players
title: Andrei Murygin
